entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early in the evening and ending before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023
